document_data.name: Potato
document_data.text: ''The only limit to a potato recipe is the cook's imagination.''
document_data.mainbody:
* [[Farothai]], a unique [[Thymari]] dish, was often stuffed with potatoes.
* The [[ration]]s sold by ''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'' often featured potatos.
* [[Arrabar]]an morningfeast included sauced [[scrambled eggs]], hand-shredded [[bread]], and baked [[stuffed fish|fish]], stuffed with potatoes and [[sausage]]s.
* [[Tarnsar]] was a potato dish made with onions and boar, staple of dwarven cuisine.{{Cite web/theedverse/2022-11-03 - Dwarven Cuisine}}
* Roast potatoes were cut into pieces, oven-roasted, and seasoned with [[dill]].
document_data.Description:
[[Maztica]]n potatoes were claimed to be superior to the roots of the same name that were available in northern Faerûn, growing larger and firmer and staying fresh longer.

Rootstocks sold via ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' could be used to start a garden in almost any location, since the roots grew well even in poor conditions.
document_data.Powers: Potatoes were an ingredient in activating the rust-removing powers of [[bathaerel]] powder.{{Cite dragon/421/Abyssal Trade Goods: Not a Bad Thing|31-32}}

Availability.Beyond Faerûn:
* On the [[Malatran Plateau]], where they were cultivated by the [[Simbara]] tribe.{{Cite polyhedron/102/Tribes of the Nubari|10}}
* In the land of Maztica.
Availability.Beyond Toril: * Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], potatoes were cultivated by farmers in [[Barovia]].

Notable Users of Potatoes.Races & Sentient Creatures: * Potatoes were a staple crop for surface-dwelling [[gnome]]s, who were often found farming them.{{Cite dragon/269/The New Adventures of Volo: Hin Nobody Knows|86}}
Notable Users of Potatoes.People: * The [[Elk tribe]] [[barbarian]] [[Holga Kilgore]] greatly enjoyed hot baked potatoes. While incarcerated in the cold [[Revel's End]] prison, eating a hot potato became the highpoint of her day. She seemed willing to fight for them, and was known to throw them at her foes in a fight.{{Cite video/Honor Among Thieves}}<ref><ref>

document_data.Trivia: * The planet [[Garden]] was said to resemble the roots of a young potato freshly extracted from its soil.
